channel.title: Changing "attack" to "walk here" and making you face other ppl when u attack
channel.description:
Hello community, I basically have two questions that I need answered:
1. On my server, it says "Attack" twice in the right click options. How do I make the correct one say "Walk Here"?
2. You face other NPCs when you attack them, but not other players, how do I make it so you face them too.

item.title: Changing "attack" to "walk here" and making you face other ppl when u attack
item.dc:creator: @system system
